model.node

Class Building

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.node.Node
      • model.node.Building

  • public class Building
extends Node
    A class which represent a building with list of all the room it has and its position on x and y in global position (GPS value).
    Since:
    1.0

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Building(double x, double y)
      Constructs and initializes a building at the (x,y) location.
      Building(double x, double y, int ID)
      Constructs and initializes a building at the (x,y) location with its ID.
      Building(Point P)
      Constructs and initializes a building at the Point location.
      Building(Point P, int ID)
      Constructs and initializes a building at the Point location with its ID.
